title: Cauliflower and chickpeas in tomato sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 cauliflower, broken into florets', '1 large potato, peeled and cubed', '6 tablespoons tomato puree', '1L water', '250g cooked chickpeas, drained', '1/2 teaspoon dried mint', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
